EmailTemplate.name: Member List Email
EmailTemplate.subject: WeWork Member List
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Member_First_Name__c},
Thank you for completing your Membership Agreement! We're so happy to have you at WeWork.
If you have additional team members, please download and fill out the attached form. We'll get your team members set up and ready for your move-in day as soon as you send the completed form back to us.
Thanks so much! Please let us know if you have any questions.
Your community management team {!Building__c.Email__c} WeWork.com
